Quick Start¶

Components:

  • Setup master
    • Flash OS on Raspberry Pi
    • Connect trough SSH
    • Upgrade OS
    • Install RaspAP
    • Install Docker
    • Install docker-compose
    • Start Plant Keeper Master
  • Setup Grafana
    • First login and set password
    • Add data source: Postgres (with Timescale plugin)
    • Add data source: Loki
  • Play with Grafana
    • Create dashboard: Sprinklers Sensors Table
    • Create dashboard: Sprinklers Controller
